title: data/
text:
data/
Output directory for data generated by R/ files for the website.

title: About
text: This is a dashboard for the Legend Dynasty! clan in Clash Royale, built in Quarto using the royale R package.

title: About
text:
Disclaimer
This content is not affiliated with, endorsed, sponsored, or specifically approved by Supercell and Supercell is not responsible for it. For more information see Supercell’s Fan Content Policy: <www.supercell.com/fan-content-policy>.
